Spice and Wolf VR Heads to Crowdfunding Platforms Later This Month
Related Article
paragraph:
After announcing the project back in July and following up with a look at Holo's 3D model, the folks at developer Spicy Tails are back with more info on Spice and Wolf VR. The project is currently planned for PC, HTC Vive, and Oculus Rift in 2019, and a crowdfunding campaign will kick off later this month.  The Spice and Wolf VR funding campaign will launch on both Campfire and Kickstarter on November 25, with the official pages for each to be revealed soon along with limited goods and more details.  "Spice and Wolf VR" cloud funding will start on November 25! We are preparing to thank for support such as limited goods and notice of production situation. pic.twitter.com/g3dkhSkUy5 Some animation samples from October:  「柿(kaki)」 and 「杮(kokera)」 are different kanji. Can you believe it? However, with adb install, "-" did not work, "-" succeeded.
